Description: Shoulder sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) black-figured pottery amphora (?); pinkish clay with white inclusions and some silver mica; exterior: cream slip; panther to left, with raised paw attacking a boar; red patch on neck of boar, red dots on eyes and on skin of panther; filling ornament of blobs; incision used for details of animals; band above.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.024)
